summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting an easement to US West Communications across the City of Seattle City Light Department's property in the northeast quarter of the southwest quarter of the northeast quarter of Section 31, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington (Vicinity of North 100th Street east of Stone Avenue North). (P.M. \#260431-1-302).
